info.title: Perfumes Store API
info.description:
REST API for the Perfumes Store e-commerce platform. This API provides endpoints for managing products, orders, users, and administrative functions.

## Authentication
Most endpoints require authentication via JWT tokens. The API uses HTTP-only cookies for token storage:
- `accessToken`: Short-lived access token (15 minutes)
- `refreshToken`: Long-lived refresh token (7 days)

## CSRF Protection
All state-changing operations (POST, PUT, DELETE) require a CSRF token. Obtain one via `GET /api/auth/csrf` before making requests.

## Rate Limiting
- General API: 100 requests per 15 minutes
- Authentication: 5 requests per 15 minutes
- Sensitive operations: 10 requests per hour

## Response Format
All successful responses follow this format:
```json
{
  "data": { ... }
}
```

Error responses:
```json
{
  "error": {
    "message": "Error description",
    "code": "ERROR_CODE"
  }
}
```

Authenticates a user and returns JWT tokens in HTTP-only cookies.
Uses the refresh token cookie to issue a new access token.
Clears authentication cookies for the current session.
Invalidates all refresh tokens for the user, logging them out from all devices.
